summary: Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?
cast: James Caan|Nicolas Cage|Sarah Jessica Parker|Pat Morita|Johnny Williams|John Capodice|Robert Costanzo|Anne Bancroft|Peter Boyle|Burton Gilliam|Brent Hinkley|Dean Hallo|Seymour Cassel|Jerry Tarkanian|Keone Young|Danny Kamekona|John McMahon|Lisa Ann Poggi|Ben Stein|Teddy Bergman|Tiiu Leek|Angela Pietropinto|Anna Lobell|Joanna Lipari|Joshua Nelson|Johnny Cha Cha|Captain Haggerty|Lonnie Schuyler|Earnie Shavers|Gwen Greenhalgh|Connie Kissinger|John Henry Richardson|Tony Shalhoub|Brad Blumenthal|J.J. King|Johnny Lawson|Rick Marino|Roddy Ragsdale|John D. Sarviss|Dick 'Skip' Evans|John Cressey|Howard Bohl|Barrymore Barlow|John Clerkin|Greg Miller|Don Pardo|Mark Sharp
title: Luna de miel para tres
